meaningMnemonic: You're riding your <radical>scooter</radical> toward your <radical>yurt</radical> as fast as you can because someone is trying to get in there to <radical>boil</radical> your water and you want to <kanji>intercept</kanji> them.
readingMnemonic: You manage to <kanji>intercept</kanji> the <reading>sha</reading>man (しゃ) who was just about to open the door to your yurt, and instead you crash right into him.
